title: US Corporate Debt Sales Surge in Europe
description: A rush of reverse Yankee debt sales have hit the European primary market, with five borrowers set to make it the busiest start to the year ever for the deals. Ronan Martin joins Scarlet Fu to discuss on "Bloomberg Real Yield." (Source: Bloomberg)
content: A rush of reverse Yankee debt sales have hit the European primary market, with five borrowers set to make it the busiest start to the year ever for the deals. Ronan Martin joins Scarlet Fu to discuss on "Bloomberg Real Yield." (Source: Bloomberg)
